name: create-from-git
description: Scaffolds a new project using `git checkout` and smart, in-file string replacements. Comes with an API and CLI: `npx create-from-git`. Runs on Mac, Windows and Linux.

scripts.build: esbuild ./src/index.ts --platform=node --minify --outfile=./dist/index.mjs --format=esm --sourcemap && esbuild ./src/index.ts--platform=node --minify --outfile=./dist/index.js --format=cjs --sourcemap && tsc ./src/index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir './dist' --moduleResolution node --target es2015 && esbuild ./src/cli.ts --minify --outfile=./dist/cli.js --format=cjs --sourcemap --platform=node

author: Aron Homberg <info@aron-homberg.de>
